SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]

) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

2025-03-28 08:28:51.822 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (53ms) [Parameters=[@__roles_0='?' (Size = 4000), @__normalizedPagePath_1='?' (Size = 4000), @__simplifiedPath_2='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (

SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (

    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

(Size = 4000), @p5='?' (Size = 4000), @p6='?' (DbType = Boolean), @p7='?' (Size = 4000), @p8='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SET IMPLICIT_TRANSACTIONS OFF;
SET NOCOUNT ON;
MERGE [RolePermissions] USING (
VALUES (@p0, @p1, @p2, 0),
(@p3, @p4, @p5, 1),
(@p6, @p7, @p8, 2)) AS i ([CanAccess], [PagePath], [RoleName], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([CanAccess], [PagePath], [RoleName])
VALUES (i.[CanAccess], i.[PagePath], i.[RoleName])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position;

FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]

2025-03-28 11:38:20.420 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (54ms) [Parameters=[@__roles_0='?' (Size = 4000), @__normalizedPagePath_1='?' (Size = 4000), @__simplifiedPath_2='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT TOP(1) [r].[CanAccess]
FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])

FROM [RolePermissions] AS [r]
WHERE [r].[RoleName] IN (
    SELECT [r0].[value]
    FROM OPENJSON(@__roles_0) WITH ([value] nvarchar(max) '$') AS [r0]
) AND (LEFT(@__normalizedPagePath_1, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath] OR LEFT(@__simplifiedPath_2, LEN([r].[PagePath])) = [r].[PagePath])
